items: Pirate Pete subquest of Recipe for Disaster
req.name: Quest Requirements

items: Crafting table in a player-owned house (4 Oak Planks, Saw, Hammer, 10,000gp to buy workshop)
req.name: Other Requirements

items: 10 wooden cats or [18 Planks (regular) and 10 pieces of fur (bear or grey wolf fur)]
Diving apparatus (talk to Murphy in Port Khazard twice)
req.name: Items

items: ~8,000 coin for Charter Ships or ~10 Ecto-tokens
req.name: Recommended

1.step: Make 10 wooden cats on a clockmaker's bench in your house (10 planks and 10 furs). (Chat 1)
1.subtitle: Getting started

description: Make 10 wooden cats on a clockmaker's bench in your house

2.step: Talk to Brother Tranquility on Mos Le'Harmless. (Chat 1)

description: There are two routes to Mos Le'Harmless.
Route 1: Use the charter and choose Mos Le'Harmless for 1,750gp (875gp with the ring of charos(a)).
Route 2: Pay 2 Ecto-tokens (free if finished Ghost Ahoy) to pass the gate.
Route 2: Pass the gangplank.
Route 2: Right-click and choose travel on Bill Teach to get to Mos Le'Harmless.
Talk to Brother Tranquility on Mos Le'Harmless.

3.step: Pull-on the statue and climb down.
3.subtitle: Scouting

description: Pull-on the statue.
Climb down the statue.

4.step: Equip the diving apparatus and fishbowl then descend.

description: Equip the diving apparatus and fishbowl then descend.

5.step: Repair the stairs at the end of the tunnel and climb up two times.

description: Repair the stairs at the end of the tunnel and climb up two times.
Climb up the stairs.
Climb up the ladders.
Peer through the peephole.
Talk to Brother Tranquility on Harmony Island.

8.step: Search the bookcase at the Edgeville Monastery, then open the book.

description: Search the bookcase in the Edgeville Monastery, then open the book.

9.step: Equip a holy symbol and return to Harmony Island.

description: Equip a holy symbol, get back to Mos Le'Harmless, then right-click and choose 'Transport' on Brother Tranquility to return to Harmony Island.
Right click the book 'recite prayer'.
Talk to Brother Tranquility on Harmony Island
Climb-up the staircase.
Climb-up the ladders.
Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain.

13.step: Equip the Ring of Charos and talk to Rufus in Canifis. (Chat 1)

description: Equip the Ring of Charos and talk to Rufus in Canifis.

14.step: Build a crate next to Dr. Fenkenstrain, add-bottom (4 planks and nails), and fill it with the wooden cats.

description: Build a crate next to Dr. Fenkenstrain.
Add-bottom to the crate (4 planks and nails).
Fill the crate with the wooden cats.
Blow the wolf whistle.

16.step: Use the shipping order on the crate.

description: Use the shipping order on the crate.
Get back to Mos Le'Harmless then right-click and choose 'Transport' on Brother Tranquility to return to Harmony Island.
Climb down the ladders.
Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain.

18.step: Equip your diving equipment and search the locker for a fuse.

description: Equip your diving equipment and exit the door then go north to the shipwreck.
Go north to the shipwreck and search the locker for a fuse.

19.step: Climb the ladder and pick-up a tinderbox and a keg.

description: Climb the ladder and pick-up a tinderbox and a keg.
Pick-up a tinderbox.
Pick-up a keg.

20.step: Use the keg and fuse on the monastery door. Light the fuse.

description: Use the keg on the monastery door.
Use fuse on the monastery door.
Use the tinderbox on the fuse.

21.step: Enter and defeat 4 Sorebones for a Cranial clamp, Brain tongs, 3 Bell jars, and 30 Skull staples.

description: Enter the door.
Defeat 4 Sorebones for a Cranial clamp, Brain tongs, 3 Bell jars, and 30 Skull staples.
Talk to Dr. Fenkenstrain.
Talk to Brother Tranquility

24.step: Confront Mi-Gor to start the fight against Barrelchest (level 190).
24.subtitle: Barrelchest

description: Confront Mi-Gor to start the fight against Barrelchest (level 190).

25.step: Defeat Barrelchest and pick-up the Barrelchest anchor.

description: You will not be able to use prayer. You can safe-spot Barrelchest behind a pew.
Pick-up the Barrelchest anchor.
Talk to Brother Tranquility.
